segments.text: How have you been doing lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I haven ’ t been sleeping well . I am kind of out of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there some reason why you can ’ t get enough sleep ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I go to bed , but I just can ’ t get comfortable enough to stay asleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When do you turn in for the night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually try to go to bed around 11
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a lot on your mind when you try to go to sleep ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My mother is ill with cancer , and I think about her a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you ever meditate or read before bedtime ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually watch a lot of television before I go to bed . Maybe I should try something else to help me quiet down .
segments.speaker: S2
